description: Removed deprecated ginko-mcp tools and references. Deleted ginko-mcp server from .mcp.json (kept statusLine for coaching). Removed unused ginko-mcp-client tarball dependency from package.json. This eliminates ambiguity at session start and resolves Vercel deployment issues.

Resolved Graph API localhost connection error by adding NEO4J_URI environment variable. Updated protocol from bolt:// to neo4j:// to match browser connection. Credentials verified correct (neo4j/Palindrome000) via Neo4j Browser. Current blocker: authentication still failing from Vercel despite working locally - likely firewall/IP restriction or SSL requirement for remote connections.

Fixed CLI event sync JSON parse error
Root cause: Missing endpoint on dashboard - existed in api/ but not dashboard/src/app/api/

Created ADR-044 for Neo4j AuraDB migration with event lifecycle
Alternatives: Hetzner+Vercel Static IPs ($20/mo), Fixie proxy ($10/mo), AuraDB Pro from day 1 ($65/mo), custom event storage (dev time). Chose AuraDB Free for $0 cost, managed service, and lifecycle extends capacity to 43 users.
Successfully exported complete Neo4j database from Hetzner (118 nodes, 1,069 relationships, 6.5MB). Export includes all ADRs, PRDs, events, embeddings ready for AuraDB migration per ADR-044.
Successfully migrated complete database to Neo4j AuraDB. Imported 118 nodes and 1,069 relationships in 127s with 100% verification. Ready for production deployment.
Deployed Ginko to production with AuraDB credentials. API deployed successfully with Neo4j AuraDB connectivity. Migration complete per ADR-044.

Fixed EventQueue timer keeping ginko start process alive indefinitely. Root cause: setInterval timer at event-queue.ts:82 kept Node.js event loop alive, preventing process exit after 'Session Ready' message. Solution: Added .unref() to timer, allowing process to exit when no other work pending. Reduced total startup time from 90s to 2s (47x improvement).
Root cause: setInterval timer kept event loop alive preventing process exit
